thread.title: Life | Ryanair are thinking about letting you bring your dogs on board
thread.title_full: Life | Ryanair are thinking about letting you bring your dogs on board - entertainment.ie

author: Jason Brennan
title: Life | Ryanair are thinking about letting you bring your dogs on board
text:
Forget about putting your best friend in a kennel for a week just for the sake of a holiday, that time is over it would seem.
The budget airline has recently suggested that it could be open to letting small pets in the cabin for short flights to Europe.
David O'Brien, the company's chief commercial, has said "we are open to lots of suggestions, it's one we're looking at.
"It could be quite difficult. What makes one person happy would make another unhappy.
"But we'd be interested to hear what people think."
Here's what we think, let us bring our dogs with us. We need them, everywhere we go, all the time, we're co-dependent.
Via Daily Mirror
